projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subTitle: Here are you may find some of my recents projects.
projects.projectOneDescription: A web application built with Next.js and MongoDB that allows users to explore events, filter them by categories (such as Music, Sports, Technology, etc.), and view event details.
projects.projectTwoDescription: A modern website for a packaging company, showcasing products, and contact information. Built with Next.js and styled using Tailwind CSS for a responsive and user-friendly experience.
projects.projectThreeDescription: A bento grid with a chat and terminal, to showcase project that have been done.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.mainParagraph: Ready to start your next project? Let's create something amazing together!
contact.subTitle: Let's connect
contact.subParagraph: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, creative projects, or just having a chat about technology and design.
contact.responseParagraph: I typically respond to emails within 24 hours. For urgent inquiries, feel free to call!

form.name: Full Name

form.messageSuccessText: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you soon.
